Name: Rainy Season
About the game: The family was ready to visit the amusement park, but plans are cancelled due to weather. This is a story about an ordinary family spending time at home during the rain. 'Rainy Season' is a narrative game that is playable to finish in less than 1 hour. Interact with objects Touch and interact with items within house to learn about them. Talk to the family During various times, listen and engage in conversations with the family. Daydreams Special events will occur when bored.
